languages.text: {n}Стоит голосу Арлекина смолкнуть, как тишину разрывает поток непереводимой, но крайне экспрессивной ксеносской брани: Маражай вновь обрел способность говорить и решил употребить ее на то, чтобы, похоже, проклясть кого-то до седьмого колена.{/n} "Провидцев! Иремерисс приволокла провидцев Азуриан в Темный город! Безмозглая, отчаявшаяся сука! Если об этом узнает... о-о-о, конечно же, он об этом уже знает! Ты, Аребенниан! Ты заявился в Комморру, чтобы сообщить Векту о преступлениях моей сестры и спасти ее пленников!"

{n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит голосу Арлекина смолкнуть, как тишину разрывает поток непереводимой, но крайне экспрессивной ксеносской брани: Маражай вновь обрел способность говорить и решил употребить ее на то, чтобы, похоже, проклясть кого-то до седьмого колена.{/n} "Провидцев! Иремерисс приволокла провидцев Азуриан в Темный город! Безмозглая, отчаявшаяся сука! Если об этом узнает... о-о-о, конечно же, он об этом уже знает! Ты, Аребенниан! Ты заявился в Комморру, чтобы сообщить Векту о преступлениях моей сестры и спасти ее пленников!"

traits.locale_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities. Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone to their seventh knee.{/n} "The Seers! Yremeryss brought the Asuryani Seers to the Dark City! You dumb desperate bitch! If this news reaches the... Oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Quand l'Arlequin finit par se taire, le silence est brisé par un torrent d'injures xénos intraduisibles, mais parfaitement interprétables. Marazhai semble avoir retrouvé la parole et l'emploie pour maudire quelqu'un, ainsi que sa progéniture.{/n} « Les Grands Prophètes ! Yremeryss a fait venir les Grands Prophètes asuryanis dans la Cité Crépusculaire ! Stupide mégère ! Si jamais il l'apprend... Oh, mais il est déjà au courant, c'est évident ! Vous, l'Arebennian ! Vous êtes venus à Commorragh pour informer Vect des crimes de ma sœur et sauver ses prisonniers ! »
languages.original_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand l'arlequin finit par se taire, le silence est brisé par un torrent d'injures xénos intraduisibles, mais parfaitement interprétables. Marazhai semble avoir récupéré la parole et l'emploie pour maudire un individu, ainsi que sa progéniture.{/n} « Les Grands Prophètes ! Yremeryss a fait venir les Prophètes asuryanis dans la Cité Crépusculaire ! Pauvre conne si désespérée ! Si jamais il l'apprend... Oh, mais il est déjà au courant, c'est évident ! Vous, l'arebennian ! Vous êtes venus à Commorragh pour informer Vect des crimes de ma sœur et sauver ses prisonniers ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}当丑角的声音消失时，一大串无法翻译但极富感染力的异形脏话打破了沉默。玛拉斋恢复了说话的能力，疯狂地咒骂着某个人的亲属与那个人的所有子孙后代。{/n}“是先知！伊芮梅莉斯这个狗急跳墙的蠢婊子！她居然把方舟灵族的先知带到了黑暗之城！如果这个消息传到……噢，他肯定已经知道了！你，独角！你来科摩罗，就是为了告诉维克特我姐姐犯下了罪行，顺便把她那些囚犯全都救出来，对吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}当丑角的声音消失时，一大串无法翻译但极富感染力的异形脏话打破了沉默。玛拉斋恢复了说话的能力，疯狂地咒骂着某个人的亲属与那个人的所有子孙后代。{/n}“是先知！伊芮梅莉斯这个狗急跳墙的蠢婊子！她居然把方舟灵族的先知带到了黑暗之城！如果这个消息传到……噢，他肯定已经知道了！你，独角！你来科摩罗就是为了告诉维克特我妹妹犯下了的罪行，顺便把她那些囚犯全都救出来，对吧！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンの声が消えた後に訪れた静寂は、翻訳不可能だが表現豊かな罵り言葉を異種族がぶちまけたことで破られた。マラズハイが発声能力を取り戻し、誰かの血族や子孫を呪っているのだ。{/n}「先見司どもが！イレメリスがアシュリヤーニの予見者たちを仄暗き都に連れてきやがった！このバカ女め！もしこの知らせが届けば…いや、もう届いているだろう！アーベニアンめ！ヴェクトに我が姉妹の犯罪を知らせ、捕らわれた者どもを救出するためにコモラフに来たんだな！」
languages.original_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンの声が消えた後に訪れた静寂は、翻訳不可能だが表現豊かな罵り言葉を異種族がぶちまけたことで破られた。マラズハイが発声能力を取り戻し、誰かの血族や子孫を呪っているのだ。{/n}「先見司どもが！イレメリスがアシュリヤーニの予見者たちを仄暗き都に連れてきやがった！このバカ女め！もしこの知らせが届けば…いや、もう届いているだろう！アーベニアンめ！ヴェクトに我が姉妹の犯罪を知らせ、捕らわれた者どもを救出するためにコモラフに来たんだな！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Harlequins Stimme verblasst und eine Sturzflut von unübersetzbaren, aber eindeutigen Xenos-Beleidigungen durchbricht die Stille ... Marazhai hat seine Sprache wiedergefunden und benutzt sie, um wilde Flüche auszustoßen.{/n} "Runenpropheten! Yremeryss brachte die Asuryani-Runenpropheten in die Dunkle Stadt! Dämliches, verzweifeltes Miststück! Wenn diese Neuigkeit ... oh, natürlich hat sie ihn längst erreicht! Arebennian! Ihr seid nach Commorragh gekommen, um Vect von den Verbrechen meiner Schwester zu erzählen und ihre Gefangenen zu retten!"
languages.original_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Harlequins Stimme verblasst und eine Sturzflut von unübersetzbaren, aber äußert ausdrucksstarken Xenos-Beleidigungen durchbricht die Stille. Marazhai hat zur Fähigkeit des Sprechens zurückgefunden und nutzt sie, um seine Art und seine Nachkommen zu verfluchen.{/n} "Die Runenpropheten! Yremeryss brachte die Asuryani-Seher in die Dunkle Stadt! Dummes, verzweifeltes Miststück! Sollte diese Nachricht ... Oh, natürlich hat sie ihn schon erreicht! Arebennian! Ihr seid nach Commorragh gekommen, um Vect von den Verbrechen meiner Schwester zu erzählen und ihre Gefangenen zu retten!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando el Arlequín calla, el silencio se ve interrumpido por un torrente de improperios intraducibles pero sumamente expresivos. Marazhai ha recuperado la facultad de hablar y la está empleando para maldecir a alguien y a toda su progenie, viva o muerta.{/n} «¡Los videntes! ¡Yremeryss ha traído a los videntes Asuryani a la Ciudad Siniestra! ¡Zorra estúpida y desesperada! Si se entera de esto el... ¡Oh, por supuesto que se habrá enterado ya! ¡Tú, Arebennian! ¡Has venido a Commorragh para informar a Vect de los crímenes de mi hermana y rescatar a sus prisioneros!».
languages.original_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando el Arlequín calla, el silencio se ve interrumpido por un torrente de improperios intraducibles pero sumamente expresivos. Marazhai ha recuperado la facultad de hablar y la está empleando para maldecir a alguien y a toda su progenie, viva o muerta.{/n} «¡Los videntes! ¡Yremeryss ha traído a los videntes Asuryani a la Ciudad Siniestra! ¡Zorra estúpida y desesperada! Si se entera de esto el... ¡Oh, por supuesto que se habrá enterado ya! ¡Tú, Arebennian! ¡Has venido a Commorragh para informar a Vect de los crímenes de mi hermana y rescatar a sus prisioneros!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Arleken'in sesi giderek azalınca oluşan sessizlik, tercüme edilmesi imkânsız fakat bir o kadar da coşkulu bir biçimde yağan zeno küfürleriyle bölünüyor... Konuşma yetisine yeniden kavuşmuş olan Marazhai, bununla birilerinin soyuna, sülalesine lanet okuyor.{/n} "Yremeryss, Kara Şehir'e Asuryani Ötesezenleri getirmiş! Salak karı! Gözü dönmüş bunun! Hele bu bir duyulsun... Tabii ya, bunu duymuş bile! Arebennian, bana bak! Commorragh'a, ablamın işlediği suçları Vect'e bildirip elindeki mahkûmları kurtarmaya gelmişsin!"
languages.original_text: {n}When Harlequin's voice fades, the silence is broken by a torrent of untranslatable but highly expressive xenos profanities — Marazhai has regained the power of speech and is using it to curse someone's kin and progeny.{/n} "Farseers! Yremeryss brought Asuryani Farseers to the Dark City! You stupid, desperate shrew! If this news reaches the— oh, but of course it has reached him already! You, Arebennian! You came to Commorragh to inform Vect of my sister's crimes and rescue her prisoners!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken'in sesi giderek azalınca oluşan sessizlik, tercüme edilmesi imkânsız fakat bir o kadar da coşkulu bir biçimde yağan zeno küfürleriyle bölünüyor... Marazhai, yeniden konuşma yetisine kavuşmuş ve bu yetisiyle birilerinin soyuna ve sülalesine lanet okuyor.{/n} "Yremeryss, Kara Şehre Asuryani Ötesezenleri getirmiş! Salak karı! Gözü dönmüş bunun! Hele bu bir duyulsun... Tabii ya, bunu duymuş bile! Arebennian, bana bak! Commorragh'a kız kardeşimin işlediği suçları Vect'e bildirip elindeki mahkûmları kurtarmaya gelmişsin!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
